enisa api wishwasa karanawa ada ape rata watila thiyena walen godaganna puluwan nayakaya ethuma kiyala. 2010 janadhipathiwaranaye gaththoth jathika themawa wune sanwardhanaya. 2015 di yahapalanaya. 2019 wana wita pradhana themawa jathika aarakshawa bawata pathwela thiyanawa.
